title: "What are the recommended books on animal magnetism and their authors?"
first_phrase: In the following 200 tokens, you will find a list of recommended works related to magnetism. Before that, it is suggested that you read our previous work "Mesmerismus © - Power of Personal Magnetism for Life and Well-being" for a more general overview of magnetism in a social context. To help you deepen your knowledge, we have compiled a list of works consulted, including "Cours de magnétisme en sept leçons" by Baron Dupotet de Sennevoy and "Le magnétisme animal" by Alfred Binet and Ch. Féré. These books cover the physical, physiological, and therapeutic properties of animal magnetism.

last_phrase: In conclusion, the study of animal magnetism or mesmerism dates back to the late 18th century with contributions from numerous researchers and practitioners who explored its physical, physiological and therapeutic properties. While some of these studies and their conclusions have been debated or replaced with other medical or scientific theories, the exploration of how the mind and body connect continues to be an essential area of study for medical and psychological practitioners today.
